author: Rebecca Falconer
title: Rep. Adam Kinzinger breaks with his own party’s anti-Biden tweet
description: He said the GOP tweet "feeds into" Putin's narrative.
content:
Rep. Adam Kinzinger (R-Ill.) called out his fellow House Republicans on Tuesday for criticizing President Biden's response to Russia invading Ukraine.
Driving the news: House Republicans tweeted a s… [+606 chars]
